survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Home Energy Efficiency Practices Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and practices related to home energy efficiency, including awareness, adoption of energy-saving technologies, and barriers to implementation.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with home energy efficiency practices?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with home energy efficiency practices?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following energy-saving technologies do you currently use in your home? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox layout. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following energy-saving technologies do you currently use in your home? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What are the primary barriers preventing you from adopting more energy-efficient practices in your home?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if 'None of the above' is selected in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed responses. Ensure mobile-friendly input field.

script.question_text: What are the primary barriers preventing you from adopting more energy-efficient practices in your home?
script.routing_logic: This question appears if 'None of the above' is selected in Q2.
